item.description: 发布10分钟的招募--完全符合的认证会员

sql-item.sql: SELECT DISTINCT il.item_id,c.company_id as supplier_id,il.case_num,il.service_areas,il.is_area_valid_case, supp.user_id,supp.`name`,supp.mobile,supp.openid FROM ( SELECT i.item_id,i.categories,ifnull(i.register_fund,0) as register_fund, ifnull(i.case_num,0) as case_num,i.is_area_valid_case,ifnull(i.service_areas,'china') as service_areas, l.qualification_code,l.level_code,l.priority FROM b2b_parameter.bsp_qualification_level l inner join b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item i on (FIND_IN_SET(CONCAT(l.qualification_code,'-',l.level_code),i.service_quals) or ifnull(i.service_quals,'') ='') WHERE i.create_time BETWEEN DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -50 MINUTE) and DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -10 MINUTE) and i.register_end_date>now() ) il inner join b2b_parameter.bsp_qualification_level l on il.qualification_code=l.qualification_code AND l.priority>=il.priority inner join b2b_company.uuc_supplier_qualify_code c on c.qualify_name_code=il.qualification_code AND c.qualify_level_code=il.level_code INNER JOIN ( select a.supplier_id,ifnull(a.reg_capital,0) as reg_capital,b.category_code,u.user_id,u.`name`,r.mobile,w.openid from b2b_company.uuc_supplier_basic a INNER JOIN b2b_company.uuc_supplier_service_category b on a.supplier_id=b.supplier_id INNER JOIN b2b_user.uuc_user_identity ui on ui.company_id=a.supplier_id INNER join b2b_user.uuc_user u on ui.user_id=u.user_id and u.user_biz_type=1 left join b2b_user_business.business_card_record r on u.user_id=r.user_id left join ( SELECT wxa.userid,wxa.openid FROM m_yct.m_wx2ycguser wxa INNER join m_yct.zq_user zqu on wxa.openid=zqu.openid WHERE zqu.appid=@appId ) w on u.user_id=w.userid ) supp on c.company_id =supp.supplier_id and il.categories=supp.category_code and supp.reg_capital>=il.register_fund GROUP BY supp.user_id
sql-item.description: 发布10分钟的招募--注册资本、分类、服务资质都符合的公司用户

sql-item.sql: select sum(cnt) as is_area_fit from ( select if(@service_areas='china',1,0) cnt UNION all select COUNT(DISTINCT a.item_area_id) cnt from ( select province_code,city_code from b2b_company.`uuc_supplier_institution` where company_id=@supplier_id and status=2 and is_del=0 UNION select province_code , city_code from b2b_company.uuc_supplier_basic where supplier_id=@supplier_id ) temp LEFT JOIN b2b_bidding.`bid_recruit_company_area` a on a.item_id=@item_id and ( ( a.province_code=temp.province_code and a.city_code=temp.city_code ) or ( a.province_code=temp.province_code and IFNULL(a.city_code,'')='' ) ) where temp.province_code is not NULL )a

select if(if((@is_area_valid_case<>1 or (@service_areas='china' and @is_area_valid_case=1)),a.cnt1,b.cnt2)>=@case_num,1,0) as is_case_fit from ( select count(1) as cnt1 From b2b_company.uuc_supplier_project where is_del= 0 and status=2 and is_published=1 and company_id=@supplier_id )a cross JOIN ( SELECT count(item_area_id) as cnt2 from b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item_area a left join b2b_company.uuc_supplier_project p on (a.service_area=p.project_province_code or a.service_area=p.project_city_code) where a.item_id=@item_id and p.company_id=@supplier_id and p.is_del= 0 and p.status=2 and p.is_published=1 ) b

SELECT DISTINCT b.item_id as itemId,d.category_name,CONCAT(d.category_name,'招募公告') as title ,ifnull(c.short_name,c.company_name) as company_name, c.developer_type AS developerType,date_format(b.create_time,'%Y-%c-%e') as created_time, date_format(b.register_end_date,'%Y-%c-%e') as register_end_date, GROUP_CONCAT(area_name.item_name SEPARATOR '、') as area_name,concat('m.mycaigou.com/zm/detail-',b.item_id,'.html') as shortURL, if(b.case_num>0,concat('注资',b.register_fund,'万元及以上，案例',b.case_num,'个以上'),concat('注资',b.register_fund,'万元及以上')) as register_condition FROM ( select item_id,categories,company_id,create_time,register_condition,register_end_date,service_areas, ifnull(register_fund,0) as register_fund ,ifnull(case_num,0) as case_num FROM b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item where item_id=@item_id ) b left join ( select item_id from b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item_register where supplier_id = @supplier_id and item_id=@item_id ) r on b.item_id=r.item_id INNER JOIN b2b_company.uuc_developer c ON b.company_id = c.developer_id left JOIN ( SELECT company_id,supplier_id FROM b2b_company.bid_developer_mysupplier a WHERE a.status = 3 AND a.is_del = 0 and supplier_id=@supplier_id ) black on c.developer_id=black.company_id INNER JOIN b2b_parameter.bsp_basic_forest d on b.categories=d.category_code INNER JOIN b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item_area area on b.item_id=area.item_id inner join ( select item_code,item_name from b2b_parameter.bizp_area union ALL select 'china','全国' ) area_name on (area.province_code=area_name.item_code or area.city_code=area_name.item_code) WHERE r.item_id is null and black.company_id is null and b.register_end_date>now() AND c.company_name not like 'test_%' GROUP BY b.item_id
